data.title: Do Deuce dominates the 44th Japan Cup in association with Longines
data.description: Do Deuce Triumphs in the 44th Japan Cup

data.title: Four dead, girl seriously injured in Samut Prakan shooting spree
data.description: SAMUT PRAKAN: Four people died and a girl was severely wounded when a man opened fire at a neighbouring family and then took his own life.

data.title: Heavy rain to hit southern Thailand
data.description: The Meteorological Department warned residents of Chumphon, Surat Thani, Nakhon Si Thammarat, Phatthalung, Songkhla, Pattani, Yala and Narathiwat to brace for heavy showers, which are forecast to hit the South until Nov 30.

data.title: Evolving HER2-positive breast cancer treatment to improve survival rate
data.description: Treatment for human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2)-positive breast cancer continues to evolve, resulting in improved survival and enhancing the quality of life for patients, medical experts said.

data.title: Huawei Cloud Tops Global Rankings for Container Services
data.description: Recently, Huawei Cloud has been named as a global leader in the  Omdia Universe: Cloud Container Management & Services, 2024–25. Huawei Cloud has ranked the top cloud provider in the world for its container services in product strategy and execution, showcasing its leadership in cloud native, the software approach of building, deploying, and managing modern applications in cloud computing environments. This outstanding achievement is attributed to Huawei Cloud

data.title: Transport ministry pushes flood mitigation in northern Thailand
data.description: The Transport Ministry will present a comprehensive flood-mitigation plan for Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai at a mobile cabinet meeting in Chiang Mai on Friday, according to Transport Permanent Secretary Chayatan Phromsorn on Monday.

data.title: Unemployment rises by 1.02% in third quarter
data.description: Decreasing employment in several industries and new graduates facing tougher times finding jobs cited as the main causes for drop

data.title: Ministers summoned over Khao Kradong land dispute
data.description: The House committee on land, natural resources and the environment has summoned the interior and transport ministers to provide more information on the Khao Kradong land controversy on Wednesday.

data.title: Thaksin 'key factor' in Udon Thani local election win
data.description: The ruling Pheu Thai Party believes former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra played a key role in helping its candidate secure victory in the provincial administrative organisation (PAO) chairman election in Udon Thani.

data.title: Govt keen to downplay Thai-Cambodian sea spat
data.description: The government expressed confidence on Monday that the 2001 memorandum of understanding on joint development in the Gulf of Thailand  signed by Thailand and Cambodia  would not trigger mass protests.

data.title: Technologies and approaches developed to tackle colorectal cancer
data.description: Surgery for colorectal cancer has been developed over time to improve the outcome, medical experts said during an academic meeting hosted by the Bangkok Dusit Medical Services (BDMS).

data.title: AI-Powered "PresScribe" by Looloo Health Transforms Healthcare Across Thailand
data.description: November 26, 2024 —  Bangkok Medical Software Co, Ltd (BMS), together with Looloo Health, uses Microsoft technology to empower healthcare professionals in 35 hospitals across Thailand with "PresScribe," an innovative AI-powered solution. Integrated with BMS-HOSxP and BMS-HOSxP XE systems, PresScribe transcribes doctor-patient conversations and automatically summarizes key medical information. This frees up clinicians to focus on meaningful patient interaction and deliver more effective care. BMS plans to expand PresScribe

data.title: Auto manufacturing down nearly 20% year on year
data.description: Stringent conditions for obtaining loans for vehicle purchase add more strain to an already suffering automotive industry

data.title: China remains top durian importer, Thailand seeks quality edge
data.description: Surge in demand presents both opportunities and challenges for Thai durian exporters

data.title: Heavy rain to hit the South
data.description: The Meteorological Department warned residents of Chumphon, Surat Thani, Nakhon Si Thammarat, Phatthalung, Songkhla, Pattani, Yala and Narathiwat to brace for heavy showers, which are forecast to hit the South until Nov 30.

data.title: DOJ eyes VP Duterte's criminal liabilities for Marcos kill threat
data.description: Vice President Sara Duterte’s threat against the life of President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. showed her “lack of recourse to legal and judicial remedies” which “exposes” her to criminal liabilities, the Department of Justice (DOJ) said Monday.

data.title: Malaysian ambassador honoured with vibrant tuk-tuk send-off in Thailand
data.description: Malaysia's Ambassador to Thailand, Jojie Samuel, bid an unforgettable farewell to Bangkok with a special tuk-tuk (three-wheeled taxi) tour through the city's vibrant streets, marking the end of his distinguished diplomatic tenure.

data.title: Singapore civil servants to get 1.05-month bonus; juniors get extra $600
data.description: Civil servants will get 1.05 months of a year-end bonus, the Public Service Division (PSD) announced in a statement on Nov 25.

data.title: UA Combine 2024: Southeast Asia’s strength test dominates Bangkok scene
data.description: UA Combine 2024 returned for its third year on November 23 at MCC Hall, Central Ladprao. Nearly 1,000 participants, including elite athletes, amateurs, and entertainment stars, competed in intense physical challenges for a 500,000 baht prize, pushing their limits.

data.title: Malaysian ambassador honoured with vibrant tuk-tuk send-off in Thailand
data.description: BANGKOK: Malaysia's Ambassador to Thailand, Datuk Jojie Samuel, bid an unforgettable farewell to Bangkok with a special tuk-tuk (three-wheeled taxi) tour through the city's vibrant streets, marking the end of his distinguished diplomatic tenure.

data.title: Activist seeks court action on MoU deal
data.description: The Ombudsman has been asked to petition the Constitutional Court to rule whether a 2001 memorandum of understanding (MoU) on joint development in the Gulf of Thailand signed by Thailand and Cambodia breaches the constitution.

data.title: Hope Fair kicks off for the holiday season
data.description: The Hope Fair will kick off the holiday season with a pop-up Christmas market featuring bespoke selections by over 100 local and regional partner vendors, in the Ballroom of Avani Sukhumvit Bangkok Hotel, tomorrow from 11am to 8pm.

data.title: RBSO to host concert for cancer care
data.description: The Royal Bangkok Symphony Orchestra Foundation presents "Melodies for Medicine: A Celebration of Classical And Thai Music", a special event that combines a medical talk and a concert at Kian Gwan Building, Witthayu Road, on Sunday from 2pm to 4.30pm.

data.title: Jim Thompson farm celebrates Isan culture
data.description: While enjoying winter temperatures, visitors to Nakhon Ratchasima can immerse in a charming Isan-style town surrounded by lush mountain ranges and beautiful flower fields as part of Jim Thompson Farm 2024: Isan Calling, which runs from Dec 7 until Jan 1.

data.title: Preserving the past
data.description: On Nov 17, a group of individuals with a shared passion for history and culture gathered at the wonderful Fazal Building in Bangkok for the exclusive opening of "New Century - The E.M. Katib Legacy".

data.title: PM urges action to protect women, kids from abuse
data.description: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra on Monday urged the public to support government efforts to end violence against children and women.

data.title: Buriram clash with Kawasaki Frontale in ACL Elite
data.description: Thai champions Buriram United will be eager to make amends for the heavy AFC Champions League Elite defeat they suffered a few weeks ago when they take on Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday.

data.title: Transport ministry pushes North flood mitigation
data.description: The Transport Ministry will present a comprehensive flood-mitigation plan for Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai at a mobile cabinet meeting in Chiang Mai on Friday, according to Transport Permanent Secretary Chayatan Phromsorn on Monday.

data.title: Phuket steps up for  carbon-free tourism
data.description: Phuket took a significant step toward sustainable tourism with the launch of the "Phuket Old Town Carbon Neutrality 2030" initiative, aimed at making the historic old town the first carbon-neutral area in Thailand by 2030.

data.title: Ministers summoned over Khao Kradong dispute
data.description: The House committee on land, natural resources and the environment has summoned the interior and transport ministers to provide more information on the Khao Kradong land controversy on Wednesday.

data.title: Thaksin 'key factor' in Udon Thani win
data.description: The ruling Pheu Thai Party believes former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra played a key role in helping its candidate secure victory in the provincial administrative organisation (PAO) chairman election in Udon Thani.

data.title: Govt keen to downplay sea spat
data.description: The government expressed confidence on Monday that the 2001 memorandum of understanding on joint development in the Gulf of Thailand signed by Thailand and Cambodia would not trigger mass protests.

data.title: Thai politician Samart arrested over iCon Group fraud case
data.description: Police arrested politician  Samart Janechaijittawanich  in the northernmost province of Chiang Rai on Monday after he was wanted for alleged  money laundering  in connection with  The iCon Group  fraud case.

data.title: Court okays detention of Dr Boon’s wife, daughter in huge fraud case
data.description: The police and victims are against bail for fear of them fleeing or tampering with evidence; testimony from 10 additional witnesses pending

data.title: Khao Kradong dispute: Authority of land revocation body faces query
data.description: House panel chaired by People’s Party MP to address Buri Ram land dispute, as state land department calls on SRT to prove ownership

data.title: NESDC releases Q3 2024 Thai Social Conditions Report
data.description: Household-debt growth slowed, amounting to 16.32 trillion baht, with a growth rate of 1.3%,

data.title: Foreigners flee Myanmar scam gang into Thailand's Mae Sot
data.description: TAK: Thirty-nine foreign nationals who claimed to be victims of a  call centre gang  were  rescued  Monday morning by Thai authorities during a border patrol operation.

data.title: Experts urge Thailand to create its own streaming hub to rival Netflix
data.description: Media professionals say a domestic platform would enable Thailand’s thriving content creation industry to reach international market

data.title: Thailand targets unsafe beta-agonist use in meat industry
data.description: Department to launch a campaign to teach livestock farmers about the dangers of using drugs to make the meat of their animals redder
